statements: SELECT user_id, access_level, start_time, end_time FROM time_based_access_controls;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM time_based_access_controls;
SELECT * FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, start_time FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM time_based_access_controls;
SELECT * FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, end_time FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM time_based_access_controls WHERE end_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM time_based_access_controls ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_rules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, end_time, start_time FROM access_rules WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM business_hours WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM business_hours WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM business_hours ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM access_rules ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time, user_id FROM access_rules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_rules ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM access_rules WHERE start_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM access_rules WHERE end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE last_access > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, role, last_access FROM employees WHERE last_access BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE last_access > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_access ASC;
SELECT e.name, ar.start_time, ar.end_time FROM employees e JOIN access_restrictions ar ON e.id = ar.employee_id WHERE ar.start_time >= '08:00:00' AND ar.end_time <= '17:00:00';
SELECT e.name, al.access_time, al.event_type FROM employees e JOIN access_logs al ON e.id = al.employee_id WHERE e.id = 3 AND al.event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY al.access_time DESC;

SELECT e.name, COUNT(al.log_id) AS login_count FROM employees e JOIN access_logs al ON e.id = al.employee_id WHERE e.role = 'Developer' GROUP BY e.name HAVING login_count > 5 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_schedule WHERE allowed_access = true;
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT employee_id, name, work_schedule FROM employees WHERE work_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT * FROM access_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE role_id = 3 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, access_logs.timestamp FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE access_logs.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';

SELECT roles.role_name, access_times.day_of_week, access_times.start_time, access_times.end_time FROM roles JOIN access_times ON roles.role_id = access_times.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'manager' ORDER BY access_times.start_time ASC;
